title: USCX returns! Everything you need to know about Virginia’s Blue Ridge Go Cross cyclocross race
content:
The third annual USCX Series opens this weekend. Here's the race times, streaming information, start lists, and more you need to watch the first U.S. pro cyclocross race of the season.

Read the full article at USCX returns! Everything you need to know about Virginia’s Blue Ridge Go Cross cyclocross race on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
